contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 5, 1953 D British Open
British Open 1 Test Piece Contest
british-open
The Three Musketeers
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes:
1st: 150 plus 2,000 Gold Challenge Trophy plus the 'Sunday Chronicle' Trophy 2nd: 120 plus The Frank Parker Memorial Cup 3rd: 80 4th: 50 5th: 30 6th: 20
Members of the winning band received engraved certificates.
The test piece was specially composed for the contest.
The Iles Medal was awarded to Harry Mortimer.
(Courtesy of 4barsrest.com)
Feb. 7, 2011, 2:27 a.m. July 5, 2011, 3:34 p.m.
